page.title: 12THE RECTOR AND HIS WORK
page.content: The Rector holds services in the church on Sundays. He also prays there on his own every day. The regular church service is called Holy Communion. He also arranges services for baptism,marriage and burial. He is responsible for the parishes of Black Torrington, Bradford, Thornbury, Highampton and Cookbury. He holds services in each parish church in turn but lives in the rectory at Black Torrington. He does things outside the church like visiting sick or elderly people who have no-one looking after them. He goes to nursing homes and hospitals, writes sermons, attends meetings and helps people in trouble. He is the chairman of the school governors and administers charities. He comes to our school every Tuesday to take a morning service, then he talks about Jesus or the Bible.
